verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I have a Savior,
He’s pleading in glory,
A dear, loving Savior,
though earth friends be few;
And now He is watching
in tenderness o’er me,
But oh that my Savior
were your Savior, too.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
For you I am praying,
For you I am Praying,
For you am I praying,
I’m praying for you.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I have a Father;
to me He has given
A hope for eternity,
blessed and true;
And soon He will call
to meet Him in heaven,
But oh that He’d let me
bring you with me, too!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I have a robe;
’tis resplendent in whiteness,
Awaiting in glory
my wondering view;
Oh, when I receive it,
all shining in brightness,
Dear friend, could I see you
receiving one, too!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
When Jesus has found you,
tell others the story,
That my loving Savior
is your Savior, too;
Then pray that your Savior
will bring them to glory,
And prayer will be answered
’twas answered for you!
